text: Avarkal, marra manitarkalaivita, inai vaikkum musrikkukalaiyum vita (ivvulaka) valkkaiyil peracai utaiyavarkalaka iruppatai (napiye!) Nir niccayamakak kanpir; avarkalil ovvoruvarum ayiram antukal valaventum ena acaippatukirarkal; anal appati avarkalukku ninta vayatu kotukkappattalum, avarkal iraivanin tantanaiyiliruntu tappa mutiyatu. Innum allah avarkal ceyvataiyellam kurntu parppavanakave irukkiran
